title: AURICO METALS : Perk.com Acquires AppRedeem
content:
Deal Type: Acquisition
Deal Sub Type: Majority Acquisition
Deal Country: United States of America Deal Status: Completed
Deal Value: 2.5109 USD  
Deal in Brief 
 
Perk.com Inc. , a Canadian cloud-based mobile rewards platform provider, has acquired AppRedeem, Inc. , a mobile application-based promotion and advertising platform based in the US, for a consideration of CAD3.32 million ( USD2.51 million ) in shares. BlueRun Ventures and SV Angel are the investors in AppRedeem.

AppRedeem is an advertising platform for mobile app discovery, branding and monetization.

Pursuant to an all stock transaction, the stockholders of AppRedeem received an aggregate of 831,601 Perk common shares based on the closing share price on September 18, 2015 . Sheffield Nolan is the founder and chief executive officer of AppRedeem.

AppRedeem generated revenue of approximately USD3.2 million for the FY 2014.

Perk believes that the acquisition will immediately add incremental earnings beginning in the fourth quarter 2015.
